div.p: This code system http://example.org/CodeSystem/cbs-temp-code-system defines the following codes:

tr.td: Subject's location of usual residence. This is a broader location representation of the LOINC Code 77983-5 (https://loinc.org/77983-5/), 'Country of Usual Residence'. The meaning of 'usual residence' is defined as per surveillance programs.
Subject's address at the time of the diagnosis for the condition of interest.

title.value: Case Based Surveillance temporary/placeholder code system.

description.value: Code system defined as placeholders for items that are not defined in existing systems.

definition.value: Subject's location of usual residence. This is a broader location representation of the LOINC Code 77983-5 (https://loinc.org/77983-5/), 'Country of Usual Residence'. The meaning of 'usual residence' is defined as per surveillance programs.
Subject's address at the time of the diagnosis for the condition of interest.
